meanings: (사회적으로 큰 영향을 미치는 사건) crisis, shock
wild fluctuations of the stock market

vlive.korean: 파동이나 입자 같은 것. Like waves and particles. 듣기 View video BURUDA CONCERT : BREWERY CONCERT KWON TREE
좋을 때 있고 파동이 되게 심해. It's very up and down. 듣기 View video GOT7 : [GOT2DAY 2016] 02. 잭슨 & 유겸
사람이 발산하는 파동 같은 거래요. That's the wave that a person emits. 듣기 View video BURUDA CONCERT : BREWERY CONCERT KWON TREE
vlive.english: That's the wave that a person emits.

vlive.korean: 막연하게 좋은 분위기라는 걸 파동으로 설명하시더군요. He explained that indescribable feeling in waves. 듣기 View video BURUDA CONCERT : BREWERY CONCERT KWON TREE
vlive.english: He explained that indescribable feeling in waves.
